cyclone.name: CRISTOBAL
cyclone.current_location: about 50 mi WSW of Campeche, Mexico
cyclone.trajectory: Meandering in the southern Bay of Campeche through mid-week, then expected to drift generally northward toward the central Gulf of Mexico late in the 5-day period
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: southern Bay of Campeche coast of Mexico (near Campecheâ€“Veracruz)

weather_observation.watch_coast: None for U.S.; Tropical Storm Warning in effect from Campeche to Puerto de Veracruz, Mexico
weather_observation.warning_coast: Campeche to Puerto de Veracruz, Mexico
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Southern Bay of Campeche coastline of Mexico
